publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2310 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau:Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 1 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of the Sexual Offences Act 2003 (Prescribed Police Stations) ( Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2005 (SSI 2005/9).
